name: company-unresolved-issues
template:
## Macro title: Company unresolved issues
## Macro has a body: N
## @noparams

<ac:structured-macro ac:name="jira" ac:schema-version="1">
  <ac:parameter ac:name="server">Jira</ac:parameter>
  <ac:parameter ac:name="columns">key,summary,assignee,created,due,status</ac:parameter>
  <ac:parameter ac:name="maximumIssues">20</ac:parameter>
  <ac:parameter ac:name="jqlQuery">Client = "$content.title" and resolution=Unresolved</ac:parameter>
  <ac:parameter ac:name="serverId">{jira-server-id}</ac:parameter>
</ac:structured-macro>
title: Company unresolved issues
